vlive.korean: 왜 네가 나보다 우리 바 행사에 신경 쓰는 거 같지? Why is that you seem to care about this event more than I do? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 마지막화) 5분 만에 전남친한테 최고의 복수하는 법 [엑스엑스(XX)] - EP.10
vlive.english: Why is that you seem to care about this event more than I do?

vlive.korean: 굉장히 신경을... 신경이라 그래야... I pay attention... How can I say? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 연휴 마지막날! 홍모닝👋🥰
vlive.english: I pay attention... How can I say?

vlive.korean: [즐겨보는(?) 신경전에 뛰어들 이번 학교?] [Which school is next?] View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 11. “저 사람은 랩하게 생겼네;;” 한 자리에 모인 12대학 래퍼들!! 시작된 신경전!!

[1라운드 '학교 스웨그 리그전' 출전 12팀의 첫 신경전이 펼쳐진다!] [Round 1, "School Swag League", the competition between the 12 teams is on!] View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 11. “저 사람은 랩하게 생겼네;;” 한 자리에 모인 12대학 래퍼들!! 시작된 신경전!!
vlive.english: [Round 1, "School Swag League", the competition between the 12 teams is on!]

vlive.korean: 계속 신경 쓰이게... It keeps bugging me. 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 그래서 넌 누구를 좋아하는데 [연애미수] EP05

examples.korean: In her nervousness she stumbled over her words. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 신경이 예민해져서 말을 더듬거렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: In her nervousness she stumbled over her words. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: As the debate went on, tempers began to fray. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 토론이 진행되자 신경들이 날카로워지기 시작했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: As the debate went on, tempers began to fray. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She was suddenly wide awake, her nerves jangling. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 갑자기 잠이 깨면서 신경이 곤두섰다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was suddenly wide awake, her nerves jangling. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It niggled him that she had not phoned back. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 답례 전화를 하지 않은 것에 그는 신경이 쓰였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It niggled him that she had not phoned back. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He gave her a drink spiked with tranquillizers. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 그녀에게 신경 안정제를 탄 술을 한 잔 주었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He gave her a drink spiked with tranquillizers. Add to Wordbook
